text: Ľubomír Roman (12 April 1944 – 14 March 2022) was a Slovak politician and actor. He was a member of the Christian Democratic Movement. He was Minister of Culture from March to December 1994 and was a member of the National Council from 1994 to 1998. He was born in Malacky, Slovakia. Roman died of a heart attack in Bratislava, Slovakia on 14 March 2022 at the age of 77. ==References== Category:1944 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Deaths from myocardial infarction Category:Slovak politicians Category:Slovak actors Category:Bratislava Region
title: Ľubomír Roman
